question:
A letter to company which is looking for help to renovate school building and you want to help for it
In your letter 
- when you could start
-what you could do
- why you want to help
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing this letter to express my willingness to help with the renovation of your school building.

Please be informed that I am pretty much available for any voluntary work, if needed such as sending emails and talking to potential sponsors that can contribute to the renovation. Thus, kindly let me know when I can start so that I can add it to my schedule. Please also note that I am a marketing student. This is my way to share my knowledge in marketing. I can share with them the importance of this project to our youngsters as well as to our society. Furthermore, I am one of the former students of the said school.
I appreciated it if you could consider my letter. Should you have any concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me on my mobile number. Looking forward to hearing from you.
